Description:
1B in 2326 , the year rival gangs for resolving disputes established league of ultra- violent street sport , which was named " Speedball ". Two teams converge face to face in a ruthless battle for the steel ball. Nine nine players fight to hit the opponent , and they are permitted insidious methods . Champion gets power over the city .
Revival of the legendary Amiga classic games on PC combines futuristic scenario and modern technology , offering players dynamic sports action.
You will find a huge amount of game modes and settings - quick matches , singles tournaments , games for multiple players and a detailed career mode . Your goal - to build your own team by speedball , intergalactic win the Champions League and bring to Earth spidbolny main trophy.
Choose from 28 teams and 6 new football stadiums ! In Speedball 2 HD has fun gameplay of the original game , as well as new formulations , new games and new schemes team of Fire, Ice and cyber .
